description: A Mullvad VPN user has discovered that Android devices leak DNS queries when switching VPN servers even though the "Always-on VPN" feature was enabled with the "Block connections without VPN" option. [...]
title: Android bug can leak DNS traffic with VPN kill switch enabled

description: Google has rolled back a recent release of its reCaptcha captcha script after a bug caused the service to no longer work on Firefox for Windows. [...]
title: Google rolls back reCaptcha update to fix Firefox issues

description: ​NATO and the European Union, with international partners, formally condemned a long-term cyber espionage campaign against European countries conducted by the Russian threat group APT28. [...]
title: NATO and EU condemn Russia's cyberattacks against Germany, Czechia

description: Microsoft announced that Windows users can now log into their Microsoft consumer accounts using a passkey, allowing users to authenticate using password-less methods such as Windows Hello, FIDO2 security keys, biometric data (facial scans or fingerprints), or device PINs. [...]
title: Microsoft rolls out passkey auth for personal Microsoft accounts
